org.resthub.identity.service

Class UserServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.core.service.GenericServiceImpl<TEntity,Long,TDao>
      • org.resthub.identity.service.AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<User,UserDao>
        • org.resthub.identity.service.UserServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericService<User,Long>, TracableService, UserService

    @Named(value="userService")
public class UserServiceImpl
extends AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<User,UserDao>
implements UserService
    An implementation of a UserService dealing with OAuth2 authentication
    It is based on AbstractEncryptedPasswordUserService It is a bean whose name is userService
